name: Bee Keeper (alexy369)
description:
You are a bee keeper.

In the next 100 days, you need to keep the bees health.

In return, they will procedure more and more honey for you to sell.

Let's see how much money you can make in the following 100 days.

============================================================

Art & Programming: Me

BGM: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/town-music-free-152789
